data.text:
BLK

Look.Match.Chat.

BLK is the #1 Dating app made for Black Singles with a simple mission: To create an exclusive community where Black men and Black women can find meaningful connections with people who share similar likes and interests.

BLK is easy and fun to use:

â¢ Simply scroll through a personalized list of profiles.

â¢ If you're interested, slide the profile to the right to give the person a âYeahâ, or click the 'Heart' icon.

â¢ If the feeling's mutual, then you're a match and can start chatting in our app right away.

â¢ Not interested? Slide the profile to the left to give the person a âNahâ, or click the âXâ icon.

Right when you join, all members can:

â¢ Become part of an exclusive community for single black men and black women

â¢ Customize who and what theyâre looking for

â¢ Receive a personalized group of profiles to look through every day

â¢ Chat with other members if theyâve liked you back

Go Premium and you can also:

â¢ Send 5 Super Likes per week to stand out from the crowd and let people know that you're really interested

â¢ Rewind on people to give them a second chance

â¢ Boost your profile each month to be one of the top profiles in your area for 30 minutes

â¢ Send unlimited amount of likes to other members

â¢ Have an uninterrupted experience with no ads!

Become Elite and you can:

â¢ Get all of the Premium benefits PLUS

â¢ Remove the mystery and See Who's Liked You for instant matches!

So what now? Join the community, spread the word, find a match, and have fun!

And don't forget! Check us out every day! We're growing fast and there's someone new to match with every day!

Privacy Policy: https://www.blk-app.com/en/privacy-policy Terms & Conditions: https://www.blk-app.com/en/terms-of-use

If you choose to purchase a subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of your subscription. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the userâs Account Settings after purchase. Current subscription starts at 9.99, and one-month, 3-month, and 6-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you donât choose to purchase a subscription, you can simply continue to use BLK.

naynae1994 ,

TERRIBLE APP.

Iâve had this app for a few years now with no issues, and all of a sudden the app decides to disable my account. So I email customer service and there are supposed to get back to you with in 48 hours ( which is a lie I waited almost a week for a response!) they first responded that they would take this to the higher ups and then a few days later one responded that it was a technical error and app should be fixed now, the next rep responded that I violated their terms and was removed because of this. I then proceeded to ask what terms I violated and they responded that they couldnât tell me due to privacy reasons ( so you cant tell me about my own account great). Horrible customer service I called in and a rep with a really heavy accent said something about having my Snapchat info on the bio and deleting my account to make a new one. ( doing that didnât help Iâm blocked so every account I make keeps being disabled ) their reps are incompetent that rep obviously didnât know what a hold button was kept me on hold with no music. And kept giving me the run around. Their follow up is horrible and their communication between reps is as well how does one rep tell me technical issues and the other says violation get if together people. If I could give them 0 stars I would! My sc info was in my bio for years now why didnât you flag a warning and remove the info itâs not that serious. The way this app handles people is ridiculous. STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP PEOPLE!

Developer Response ,

Hello! It's terrible to hear that you had a bad experience with our app and support. We'll like to hear more about your experience so we can improve things and of course, improve our app. Our email is appreviews@blk-app.com.

CaramelS24 ,

There are better dating apps with nicer platforms

This app name is misleading because it allows every race/ethnicity, which wouldnât be a cause for concern if the ânameâ and slogan/headline would be changed. Itâs a bait and switch theme to pander to African American people for âgood ratingsâ. However, like many other things, itâs not about us and not for us. There are better apps such as Facebook dating, Bumble, Match, POF etc., Customer Service? What is that? Whatâs the point of having an app for people to meet if you are doing everything in your power to remove that opportunity. Plus, if you look through the reviews, almost everyone has had the same experience so thousands of people who donât know one another, canât be lying. I hadnât been on this app in almost two years, and thatâs telling enough. They allow predatory behavior, vulgar language, and disrespectful behavior towards people on here. If you report it, nothing will happen! Another hollyweird app.. I wouldnât recommend this app to a dog!

Edit per Apple suggestion: thereâs no need to contact you all when yâall practice is to play games with the exact consumers youâre fishing for. Iâve reached out before with no resolution, so why would I waste my time doing so again? I wouldnât dare recommend yâall to my network, friends, or even people that Iâm passing by. Take a look at all of those reviews and see which entity is playing games, itâs YOU ALL. Good day

Developer Response ,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us - we're sorry to hear you haven't been happy with your experience. If you're open to it, we'd love for you to reach out to us directly through our Help Center so our team can take a closer look and provide more support.
